name: Reroll!
description:
HOW TO PLAY (:

- MOUSE to kick dice

- SPACE to dash

- Dice left untouched for a few seconds will summon a turret

- Both turrets and dice can be destroyed by kicking a die at them

CREDITS

Coding - Amir Rave

Game Design - Amir Rave, Alon Chechik

Art - Amir Rave, Alon Chechik

3D Models - Liel Bachar
